name: FUTURE- LOVELESS
description:
CORRUPTED BY OUR WORST NO ONE KNOWS WHEN BUT WE KNOW HOW TO FIX IT

A Godot Wild Jam 35 Submission

By Uneven Prankster, RoligtJackson and FalcoTz

Future Loveless is a beat 'em up set within a city overtaken by people whose faults overpowered them, becoming Loveless. Our 2 heroes, Treble and Casey, unite as they use the once thought lost power of magic to beat the evil out of people.

In this 1 and only level, the Football Court, defeat mean bullies, snob girls and more in waves to face whoever is directing all of them. Probably someone even more childish.

Move with WASD, attack with Left Click and cast your chosen magic with Right Click. Magic needs to recharge after use, but an upgrade reduces the time.

Every wave, pick 1 of 3 upgrades to Treble/Casey, and perhaps sacrifice health to empower it.. It's your choice! Just try not to die.

You can find the game's source code on Github.

Created by Me, RoligtJackson and FalcoTz.
